column5: I won $165 usd in my Dead Pool.  Since the money has bad karma, I thought I should just spend it on something I wouldn't usually buy for myself instead of paying bills or buying more RRSP's or something else so responsible.  After all, the last thing I want is my RRSP to have bad karma.  Anyway, I've been struggling for the last couple of days so I thought I'd ask OFC.  Does anyone have any thoughts about the perfect gift to oneself for no more than $165 usd?
Is that kinda like $165 CAD?  Take your sweetie for a nice meal...money in the bank.
Take it to the casino.  Take your wife or girlfriend out to a nice dinner.  Don't buy fishin gear with it!!!

not sure what a dead pool is but, if u didn't put much money if any into the pool, u could turn into good karma in the form of a donation to a good cause,  but since you're lookin for something less responsible  buy somethin u wouldn't normally buy yourself or a loved one  if it were me, as said already a nice "overdue" diner with the girlfriend or buddy  would get it  WOOOOOHOOOOOO post #1000 for me
you could always send it to some one who uses USD daily.......  Art from USA
I'd probably take my wife out to dinner, that's a pretty good suggestion. Or maybe donate it to the fishing for Tyler fundraiser that OFC is organising..
Does nobody waste money on hookers and booze anymore?
Like 100 Canadian? Spend it quick! It may be worth less soon!
Bottle of good scotch for when friends drop by the cottage!  BTW...Glen and I did the practice troll past your dock just 2 months ago....
You could always send it my way    But since that aint gonna happen I say go out for a nice dinner or buy a new rod and reel and catch a nice dinner.
Go treat yourself to some fun at the local rub-&-tug.

buy another beagle, Malcolm pups are starting to open their eyes  Honestly pay yourself first  $165 can give one a bit of piece of mind and relaxation in this hectic world. Whatever it takes to put a smile on your face - be it a case of Stella or new lures but don't forget to try and put a smile on someones elses too! Makes the day better.

Jersey dog.. use it to make a little boys day... infact more then one day..  Bid on the early bird items for Tyler.  NBA tickets still waiting to be bid on...  Know that you $$ is going to a good cause.. helping a kid that is special and requires some special friends to help him along.  One good turn deserves another...  G.
Well, I've had my eye on the Fin-nor Megalite spinning reel.  Thats pretty close to 165, plus, you can let me know if its worth buying for myself.
send it to a starving student (me)
One way to turn bad karma into goo dis to donate  Just out of curiosity (dare I ask) .. what exactly is a dead pool ?
Ya...What Gerritt said !...  If'n the money has bad karma, do you really want to pass it on to a fishing rod ?  Skunk city every time you use it...
